articles.title: rmd4pharma
articles.description: Welcome to R Markdown for Pharma — R/Pharma 2020
articles.contents:
Welcome
This is the website for a four-hour workshop for R / Pharma 2020. In this workshop, we’ll take you on a tour of how to get from data to manuscript using R Markdown. You’ll learn:
The basics of Markdown & knitr
How to add tables for different outputs
Workflows for working with data
How to include and style graphics
RStudio Cloud
https://rstd.io/rmd4pharma-cloud
Slides
01-rmd-anatomy
02-output-tables
03-graphics
04-data-workflows
